meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of an owner or ownership
meanings.sent1: The proprietaries document clearly stated the ownership rights.
meanings.sent2: The proprietaries agreement outlined the responsibilities of the owner.
meanings.sent3: The proprietaries label on the box made it clear who the owner was.
meanings.sent4: Her proprietaries attitude towards the house showed her ownership pride.
meanings.sent5: The proprietaries mark on the fence indicated private ownership.

meanings.definition: a person who owns something, especially land or a business
meanings.sent1: The proprietaries of the company made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The proprietaries of the land were responsible for its maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The proprietaries of the bakery always had the best pastries.
meanings.sent4: As a proprietaries, he had the final say in all matters.
meanings.sent5: The proprietaries was proud of the successful business he built.

meanings.definition: a right or privilege exclusive to a particular individual or group
meanings.sent1: The proprietaries of the VIP lounge enjoyed exclusive benefits.
meanings.sent2: The proprietaries of the club had access to special events.
meanings.sent3: The proprietaries of the secret recipe kept it closely guarded.
meanings.sent4: The proprietaries of the key could enter the restricted area.
meanings.sent5: The proprietaries of the pass could skip the long line.
